abstract: The French pharmaceutical giant Sanofi-Aventis says it will issue $7 billion worth of notes to help finance its acquisition of the American biotechnology firm Genzyme.
snippet: The French pharmaceutical giant Sanofi-Aventis says it will issue $7 billion worth of notes to help finance its acquisition of the American biotechnology firm Genzyme.
lead_paragraph: The French pharmaceutical giant Sanofi-Aventis said on Wednesday that it was issuing $7 billion worth of notes to help finance its acquisition of the American biotechnology firm Genzyme, which it agreed to last month.

headline.main: Sanofi Raising $7 Billion in Debt to Fund Genzyme Deal
